item.title: gatling 性能测试工具：从 0 到 1 搭建自己的 Gatling 工程
item.description: Build your own Gatling project from 0 to 1 Gradle + Scala versions Create an empty Gradle project 1 2 3 mkdir gatling-gradle-demo cd gatling-gradle-demo gradle init Configure the project build.gradle Add the following to the build.gradle file in the project You can copy the content of the build.gradle file in this project, for more configurations, please refer to the official documentation. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8

item.title: gatling 性能测试工具入门介绍
item.description: Gatling 介绍 Gatling 是一个用于性能测试和负载测试的开源工具，特别适用于测试 Web 应用程序。它是一个基于 Scala 编程语言的高性能工具，用于模拟并测量应用程序在不同负
